channel.title: Governance on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration
channel.description: Recent content in Governance on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration

item.title: Steering Committee
item.description: The Steering Committee, now operating at OASIS, is the governing body of the OSLC community that approves new workgroups, approves specifications, de-commissions workgroups, and manages other changes in governance or participation across the community. At oasis-open.org Wiki : Issues: Forum : Workgroup leads :
